refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: General function for modifying mesh_im objects

* gf_mesh_im_set(MIM,'('integ',{Integ im|int im_degree}[, ivec CVids]) Set the integration method. Assign an integration method to all convexes whose #ids are listed in `CVids`. If `CVids` is not given, the integration is assigned to all convexes. It is possible to assign a specific integration method with an integration method handle `im` obtained via gf_integ('IM_SOMETHING'), or to let getfem choose a suitable integration method with `im_degree` (choosen such that polynomials of `degree <= im_degree` are exactly integrated. If `im_degree=-1`, then the dummy integration method IM_NONE will be used.)
